sourcesContent:
import React ,{Component} from 'react' export default class AddIssue extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { issue:[], backendServer: 'http://localhost:8080/', currentIssueID:"" } }; componentDidMount(){ fetch(this.state.backendServer+ "issues") .then(response => response.json()) .then((data) => { this.setState({ currentIssueID:"ID"+(Object.keys(data).length+1) }) }) .catch(console.log) } render(){ return(
{this.state.currentIssueID}
) } }
